content: 3-4 chain and 6 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 then slip_stitch into first chain stitch count 24 double_crochet and 24 chain 1 space 2 chain 2 then double_crochet 12 times into circle if using magic_ring now pull taut 3 slip_stitch into first double_crochet skip 2 chain to close circle round 6 half_double_crochet in all stitches around stitch count 12 double_crochet excluding beginning 2 chain 1 to commence the round hdcstndst in previous round stndst 2 half_double_crochet over next chain space round 2 double the stitch count 3 half_double_crochet in next double_crochet 1 to commence the round stndst9 in first double_crochet from previous round 4 half_double_crochet over next chain space 2 double_crochet in the same stitch that the stndst was made 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 22 times 3 2 double_crochet in each of the remaining stitches around 6 slip_stitch into the hdcstndst from step 1 4 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 stitch count 48 half_double_crochet stitch count 24 double_crochet 2 dcs made in each stitch from round 1 round 7 first round diamond flower round 3 increase in every second stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in previous round hdcstndst 1 to commence the round stndst in previous round stndst 2 double_crochet in each of the next two stitches 2 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 3 chain 3 and skip the next stitch 3 double_crochet in the next stitch 4 double_crochet in each of the next five stitches 4 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 5 chain 3 and skip next stitch 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 ten times 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 six times 6 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 7 double_crochet in each of the next two stitches stitch count 36 double_crochet 8 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 round 4 increase in every third stitch stitch count 40 double_crochet and 8 chain 3 space 1 to commence the round stndst in previous round stndst round 8 second round diamond flower 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 to commence the round hdcstndst and double_crochet in previous round stndst counts as first 2dctogcl 2 chain 3 and skip the next 2 double_crochet stitches and the first chain of the next previous round 3 9 or substitute with 3 chain for stndst and 2 chain for hdcstndst if you prefer then use this option consistently chain throughout page | 12 3 slip_stitch in the second middle chain of the previous round 3 chain or if you prefer work a round of crab stitch or spin stitch10 4 chain 3 and skip the third chain of the previous round 3 chain and the next 2 double_crochet stitches 5 2dctogcl in the next stitch solid except for motif option image 8 6 chain 3 and skip the next 2 double_crochet stitches and the first chain of the next previous round 3 work round 5 after initial stndst as dcs in every stitch around chain work round 6 after
